Package com.bsuir.by.nastassia.yankova.nfilm.filter

Class LocalizationFilter

java.lang.Object
jakarta.servlet.GenericFilter
jakarta.servlet.http.HttpFilter
com.bsuir.by.nastassia.yankova.nfilm.filter.LocalizationFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.servlet.Filter, jakarta.servlet.FilterConfig, Serializable
public class LocalizationFilter extends jakarta.servlet.http.HttpFilter implements jakarta.servlet.Filter
The LocalizationFilter class is a filter that handles localization functionality for the application. It extends the HttpFilter class and implements the Filter interface.
